name: Jetragon

aura.name: aerial_missile
aura.description: Can be ridden as a flying mount. Can rapidly fire a missile launcher while mounted.

description:
Look over the island of Palpagos from the ends of the sky.
When the calamity awakens again, splitting the earth and setting the heavens on fire, he will destroy it with a glare of complete obliteration.

skills.name: spirit_fire
skills.description: Shoots fireballs towards an enemy. The fireballs explode after a short distance, generating smaller fireballs that spread forward.

skills.name: dragon_burst
skills.description: Quickly discharges draconic energy, damaging those around it.

skills.name: flare_storm
skills.description: Generates two flaming tornadoes on either side before launching them at an enemy.

skills.name: draconic_breath
skills.description: Exhales breath imbued with draconic energy, dealing continuous damage to those in front of it.

skills.name: beam_comet
skills.description: Jetragon's exclusive skill. Flies at enemies on illuminated wings while firing innumerable beams. The beams explode on impact.

skills.name: fire_ball
skills.description: Creates a giant ball of flame and hurls it at an enemy. The ball explodes over a wide area upon impact.

skills.name: dragon_meteor
skills.description: Calls down numerous small meteorites and launches them at an enemy.
